name: Vanish Balls
description:
The most addicting iPhone game is now available for the iPad!

Featured on CNN


Featured by Apple in the "New And Noteworthy" section in puzzle and arcade.

Try a smart physics puzzle action. In Vanish Balls, your goal is to make the purple ball collides with another purple ball. Tap to destroy the wooden blocks. Good timing and smart thinking will help you to complete your goal.



Features:
* Addicting levels.
* Nice physics.
* Very easy instructions.
* Simple game concept.
* Retina display.
* multitasking.
* Sound effects.

In the meantime, we are working on some extra features, such as:
* More Levels.
* Achievements.
* Score based on collecting stars.

Things we might add in the future:
* GameCenter.



P.S. I'm a 15 year old iPhone game developer from Kuwait. I've just got into programing a couple of months ago.

(: ومشكورين على دعمكم المتواصل
